mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_scs_order (ORDER_ID, ORDER_CODE, CUST_ID, ORDER_TYPE, AREA_CODE, TERM_ID, ACCT_DATE, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, EFF_DATE, LOGIN_TYPE, STAT, PAY_STAT, ACT_STAT, MEMO, TERM_SEQ, OPER_ORIG, OPER_STAT, CHANNEL_TYPE, EXT_ORDER_ID, SRC_ORDER_ID, OLD_STAT, OLD_PAYSTAT, OLD_ACTSTAT, RET_CODE, RET_MSG, EXT_VALUE1, EXT_VALUE2, EXT_VALUE3, EXT_VALUE4) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{orderCode}, #{custId}, #{orderType}, #{areaCode}, #{termId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{loginType}, #{stat}, #{payStat}, #{actStat}, #{memo}, #{termSeq}, #{operOrig}, #{operStat}, #{channelType}, #{extOrderId}, #{srcOrderId}, #{oldStat}, #{oldPayStat}, #{oldActStat}, #{retCode}, #{retMsg}, #{extValue1}, #{extValue2}, #{extValue3}, #{extValue4})
